title: Foundations of Special Education: Mathematics Instruction Strategies Using Multimedia Podcasts

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level foundational mathematics knowledge and basic special education concepts
context.additional_context: Providing smartphone-based accessibility-optimized learning environments for in-service secondary school teachers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain three or more mathematical cognitive characteristics of students with special needs.
Learners can design personalized mathematics activities using multimedia podcast content.
Learners can implement five or more instructional strategies in practice to support mathematical concept acquisition for students with learning disabilities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
